Article Title: Travis and Jason Kelce surprise fans with double podcast drop ‚Äî is Taylor Swift part of the mystery?
Article Text:
Image via LAPRESSE

Kelce brothers shake up their hit podcast schedule with a surprise announcement that‚Äôs fueling wild fan theories

Celebrity guests and Kelce family momentum drive the show's rising popularity

Fan theories run wild as speculation grows about second episode

In an unexpected twist that has sent fans into a frenzy, Travis Kelce and his brother Jason Kelce announced a special treat for their loyal "New Heights" podcast listeners: two episodes dropping this week instead of the usual one.The announcement, made via the New Heights podcast ‚Äôs official social media account, teased, ‚ÄúHappy New Heights Eve, the best made-up holiday that's happening twice this week!‚ÄùThat simple post was enough to spark waves of speculation. Why the sudden double feature? Could there be a high-profile guest involved? With Travis Kelce‚Äôs headline-making relationship with Taylor Swift and Jason‚Äôs recent retirement from the NFL , some fans are even hoping Swift could make an appearance or be a topic of discussion."New Heights" has become more than just another sports podcast ‚Äî it‚Äôs now a major media platform blending football insight, family banter, and celebrity culture. In recent weeks, the Kelce brothers have featured top-tier guests including LeBron James, Jayson Tatum, and even comedic legend Ben Stiller. The most recent episode saw them chatting with former Philadelphia Eagles star Brandon Graham, which added a nostalgic twist for longtime NFL fans.Jason Kelce, now in his second year of retirement after a legendary career with the Eagles, has embraced podcasting as a way to remain close to the sport and the personalities within it. His transition has been seamless, adding an extra layer of authenticity to the show‚Äôs dynamic. Travis, meanwhile, continues to prepare for his 13th NFL season with the Kansas City Chiefs , fresh off another Super Bowl appearance.Though the first episode of the week is set to drop Wednesday at 9:30 a.m. ET, the details of the second are being kept tightly under wraps. That silence has only fueled further curiosity among fans. Could this be the episode where Taylor Swift finally makes a surprise cameo? Is there a big retirement announcement coming? Or maybe a long-anticipated guest from the NFL world?Also Read: Could Travis Kelce be planning to propose to Taylor Swift at the Kentucky Derby? Here‚Äôs why fans think so Whatever the Kelce brothers are planning, it‚Äôs clear they‚Äôve once again captured the internet‚Äôs attention. With ‚ÄúNew Heights‚Äù becoming a staple for sports fans and pop culture lovers alike, this week‚Äôs double feature is poised to make waves ‚Äî and maybe break a few records along the way.
Article Summary: Travis kelce and his brother jason have announced a surprise double feature on their podcast. The first episode of the week is set to drop wednesday at 9:30 a.m. Et. The details of the second are being kept tightly under wraps.

Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match, DC vs RR: Yesterday IPL match result
Article Text:
KL Rahul and Tristan Stubbs celebrate after the Super Over. (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Brief scores:

Delhi Capitals

Rajasthan Royals

Super Over:

NEW DELHI: Delhi Capitals defeated Rajasthan Royals in a dramatic Super Over finish ‚Äî the first of Indian Premier League 2025 ‚Äî after both teams finished tied on 188 at the Arun Jaitley Stadium on Wednesday.Pace ace Mitchell Starc starred with the ball, defending nine runs in the final over to force the tie and then conceding just 11 in the Super Over, where two crucial run-outs of Shimron Hetmyer and Riyan Parag tilted the balance.Chasing 12 in the Super Over, KL Rahul struck a double and a boundary before Tristan Stubbs launched a six off Sandeep Sharma to seal victory in four balls. Delhi, led by Axar Patel, climbed to the top of the table with five wins in six matches.Earlier, Abhishek Porel top-scored with 49, while Axar and Stubbs added rapid 34s, lifting Delhi to a competitive 188/5, including 77 runs in the last five overs.Rajasthan‚Äôs chase was led by Yashasvi Jaiswal and Nitish Rana, both scoring 51, but regular wickets hampered momentum. Starc removed Rana in the 18th over and bowled a brilliant 20th, with Dhruv Jurel run out attempting a second run on the final ball.Rajasthan, still seeking their first title since 2008, suffered their fifth loss in seven games.- 188/5 in 20 overs (Abishek Porel 49, KL Rahul 38; Jofra Archer 2-32, Wanindu Hasaranga 1-38)- 188/4 in 20 overs (Nitish Rana 51, Yashasvi Jaiswal 51; Axar Patel 1-23, Kuldeep Yadav 1-33)RR 12/2 in five balls lost to DC 13/0 in four balls
Article Summary: Delhi capitals defeated rajasthan royals in a dramatic super over finish. Both teams finished tied on 188 at the arun jaitley stadium on wednesday. Delhi, led by axar patel, climbed to the top of the table with five wins in six matches.

Article Title: Megan Thee Stallion follows Russel Wilson‚Äô wife Ciara lead with viral "defy gravity" challenge after unforgettable coachella 2025 performance
Article Text:
Megan Thee Stallion (via: Getty Images)

Ciara Wilson and Megan Thee Stallion‚Äôs Coachella Collaboration Sets the Stage on Fire

Coachella 2025 just served up one of its most unforgettable moments! Megan Thee Stallion invited Ciara Wilson to join her on stage, and the two stars put on a performance that fans will talk about for a long time. Their amazing dance moves launched a viral challenge that's sweeping through social media. Want to find out what made it so epic? It all starts with a chair and ends with the internet losing its mind.At Coachella 2025, Megan Thee Stallion shocked everyone by teaming up with Ciara Wilson for a performance that lit up the stage and kicked off a viral dance craze. Their joint effort on the 'Defy Gravity' chair challenge had fans buzzing and took social media by storm, showing that when queens come together, amazing things happen.The 'Defy Gravity' chair challenge, first started by Ciara, mixes strength, balance, and dance moves. Megan jumped in and got everyone talking about it again, with fans and other artists trying to nail the routine. Russell Wilson , Ciara's husband and the quarterback for the New York Giants, posted the performance on Instagram, showing his support with a caption: "@theestallion & @ciara. Doing the #Ecstasy by Ciara #DefyGravity Chair Challenge," accompanied by heart and laughing emojis.Fans are going wild with this one, on her Instagram people are commenting all sorts of things where one user said, ‚ÄúThe whole chair would‚Äôve folded with me in it haha. She does everything so effortlessly üî•üòç‚Äù.Even though she had some tech issues, like her mic cutting out during "Mamushi," Megan Thee Stallion really showed her professionalism. She kept going strong, not letting the sound problems stop her, and kept the crowd hyped until the very end. Her determination and commitment just proved once again that she's one of the best performers out there.At Coachella 2025 Ciara Wilson and Megan Thee Stallion delivered a spectacular example of musical collaboration that produced phenomenal results. Their stage appearance wowed audiences at the same time as launching a global dance fad showcasing the broad scope of their impact.Also Read: Nikita Tolopilo shines in NHL debut, backstops Vancouver Canucks to 2-1 overtime win over San Jose Sharks Music lovers show strong enthusiasm for the 'Defy Gravity' challenge which signifies it will be one of the major highlights of the festival year.
Article Summary: At coachella 2025, megan thee stallion shocked everyone by teaming up with ciara wilson for a performance that lit up the stage and kicked off a viral dance craze. Their joint effort on the 'defy gravity' chair challenge had fans buzzing and took social media by storm, showing that when queens come together, amazing things happen.

Article Title: IPL Vs PSL: 'Hard to look past IPL': Sam Billings when asked to compare it with PSL by a journalist in Pakistan
Article Text:
Sam Billings (Video grab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you agree with Sam Billings that the IPL is the premier T20 competition? No Yes

Bombay Sport Exchange EP 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

England cricketer Sam Billings has praised the Indian Premier League ( IPL ) as the premier T20 competition in the world, placing it above all other franchise tournaments, including the Pakistan Super League PSL ).Billings, who is currently playing for Lahore Qalandars in PSL 10, made the remark with a smile when a Pakistani journalist asked him to compare the two leagues following Qalandars‚Äô match against Karachi Kings on Tuesday.Also See: IPL Live Score "You want me to say something silly, don't you?" Billings joked, before elaborating on his views with clarity and respect."I think it‚Äôs hard to look past the IPL as the premier competition. I think that‚Äôs probably pretty obvious," he said. "But every other competition is probably just behind. In England, we‚Äôre trying to do the same like the PSL to be the second-best competition in the world. The Big Bash are trying to do the same."Billings highlighted how different leagues pose unique challenges. "Each competition presents different challenges. The conditions in Pakistan, India, Australia, or England are different. It forces you to adapt and makes you a better cricketer," he noted.On Pakistan cricket, Billings was generous in his praise. "There‚Äôs no doubt Pakistan has a huge amount of talent. The key is in structured thinking. Sometimes you try to do too much ‚Äî keeping it simple can yield better results."Billings signed off reflecting on the joy of global franchise cricket : "I love it. I get to travel the world playing cricket and hopefully put smiles on people‚Äôs faces. I wouldn‚Äôt trade this job for anything."
Article Summary: England cricketer sam billings has praised the indian premier league ( ipl ) as the premier t20 competition in the world. Billings is currently playing for lahore qalandars in psl 10. "there‚Äôs no doubt pakistan has a huge amount of talent," said billings.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Points Table: Who stands where after DC vs RR match
Article Text:
Delhi Capitals secured a thrilling Super Over victory against Rajasthan Royals, propelling them to the top of the IPL 2025 points table. Mitchell Starc's late heroics, including a crucial yorker and composed final over, forced the Super Over after Rajasthan faltered in their chase of 189.

Here's the updated IPL 2025 points table after the thriller in Delhi:

NEW DELHI: Delhi Capitals climbed back to the top of the Indian Premier League 2025 points table with a thrilling Super Over win against Rajasthan Royals at the Arun Jaitley Stadium on Wednesday. This marked DC's fifth win in six matches, taking them to 10 points ‚Äî two clear of second-placed Gujarat Titans (8 from 6).Meanwhile, the loss deepened RR‚Äôs woes, as they languish at eighth with just two wins in seven games.In a high-octane contest, both teams fought tooth and nail, but it was Mitchell Starc ‚Äôs late brilliance that swung the match DC‚Äôs way. Rajasthan, chasing 189, were off to a flying start with Yashasvi Jaiswal and skipper Sanju Samson adding 61 runs in just 5.3 overs. However, Samson pulled up with a rib injury after smashing a four and a six, retiring hurt in visible pain.Despite the setback, Nitish Rana and Jaiswal kept the Royals in the hunt. But as DC‚Äôs spinners tightened the screws, the equation got steeper ‚Äî 73 required off the last six overs. Starc returned to dismiss the well-set Rana with a peach of a yorker, and with just 9 needed in the final over, the Aussie held his nerve to force a Super Over.Rajasthan managed 11/2 in the Super Over but two quick run-outs derailed their momentum. DC, needing 12, saw KL Rahul and Tristan Stubbs finish the job with two balls to spare, sealing a memorable win and the top spot.Delhi Capitals currently sit atop the IPL 2025 points table after six games, securing five wins and one loss to accumulate 10 points and a net run rate (NRR) of +0.744.Trailing by two points are Gujarat Titans, boasting an impressive +1.081 NRR from four wins in six fixtures (W-W-W-W-L). Third place belongs to Royal Challengers Bengaluru, also on eight points but with a slightly lower NRR of +0.672 after a 4-2 record.Punjab Kings and Lucknow Super Giants share eight points as well, occupying fourth and fifth spots respectively. While Punjab‚Äôs NRR stands at +0.172, Lucknow‚Äôs is +0.086, reflecting tight contests in their seven matches. Both sides have displayed resilience with alternating wins and losses in recent games.In mid-table, Kolkata Knight Riders have six points (3-4) and a +0.547 NRR, whereas Mumbai Indians, Rajasthan Royals, Sunrisers Hyderabad, and Chennai Super Kings sit in the lower half with four points each. They will be keen to climb the standings as the tournament progresses.Next up, Delhi Capitals face a tough test against Gujarat Titans, while Chennai Super Kings look to bounce back against Mumbai Indians. As the race for playoffs intensifies, every match and NRR will matter.
Article Summary: Delhi capitals secured a thrilling super over victory against rajasthan royals. Mitchell starc's late heroics, including a crucial yorker and composed final over, forced the super over. This marked dc's fifth win in six matches, taking them to 10 points ‚Äî two clear of second-placed gujarat titans (8 from 6)

Article Title: ‚ÄúWhat did he expect?‚Äù- Yankees fire back after Juan Soto remarked on Aaron Judge
Article Text:
‚ÄúWhat did he expect?‚Äù- Yankees fire back after Juan Soto remarked on Aaron Judge (Image Source: Getty)

Juan Soto says things don't feel the same with Aaron Judge batting behind him

"It's definitely different. I had the best hitter in baseball hitting behind me."

Yankees insider reports Juan Soto "got what he wanted" but lost something huge

and said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not really going to go back and forth with this. Juan Soto just needs to keep being himself. He‚Äôs going to be fine.‚Äù

The 2025 MLB season is already hot, and fans are buzzing about one major story: Juan Soto's performance with the New York Mets. Following his massive deal to sign a $765 million contract and depart the Yankees to join the Mets, everyone is looking at him. The Mets signed Juan Soto to bring offense to their team, but his start hasn't been so great. He has hit .250/.392/.467 this year, below his normal figures. That's not what fans were hoping for from one of baseball's superstars.In an interview with Mike Puma of the New York Post, Juan Soto expressed his opinions. He stated that it feels odd to no longer have Aaron Judge hitting behind him like he did when he was with the Yankees. Juan Soto explained that pitchers would be more cautious when Aaron Judge was up next, and now things are different.He stated,These were words that made headlines in a hurry, and some Yankees fans took it personally.Certain baseball analysts would assert that Juan Soto is slowly settling into the Mets, and time may just be needed. Despite his present stats being low, he still manages to get on base a lot and hit balls hard. Barely three days ago, he registered a solid homer off the Minnesota Twins. Thus, he is still a scary hitter.An anonymous individual in the Yankees' organization had a forceful response to Juan Soto's statement. He stated, "What was he expecting? The guy wanted his money; he received it. But he surrendered a lot too." This illustrates that some believe Juan Soto made a decision out of money, but perhaps didn't consider what he'd be losing at the Yankees, such as playing alongside Aaron Judge.Even Aaron Judge was asked about it. He stayed calmAaron Judge doesn‚Äôt seem angry, he just wants Juan Soto to focus and do well.Also Read: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Definitely Different‚Äù- Mets‚Äô Juan Soto Opens Up About Pitching Changes After He Left Yankees
Article Summary: ‚Äúwhat did he expect?‚Äù- yankees fire back after juan soto remarked on aaron judge. ‚Äúit's definitely different. I had the best hitter in baseball hitting behind me," soto said. Yankees insider reports juan sato "got what he wanted" but lost something huge.

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs daughter Paulina Gretzky shows up for her husband as eyes remain on her legendary father
Article Text:
Image via Ryan Remiorz/CP

Paulina Gretzky‚Äôs heartwarming gesture to her husband comes days after she kept quiet while Wayne Gretzky got trolled



Image via Michael Reaves/Getty Images

Wayne Gretzky ‚Äôs older daughter, Paulina Gretzky, has now been spending time with her husband, professional golfer, Dustin Johnson , as the two were spotted in Georgia for the Masters Tournament, which began on 10th April. Recently, a picture of the two went viral and it shows how supportive Paulina Gretzky has been of her husband‚Äôs career.Paulina Gretzky and her husband, Dustin Johnson, were spotted before the tournament began on 10th April as Johnson participated in the Masters Par 3 Contest.Paulina Gretzky looked stunning as she wore a white shirt and pants along with white shoes and walked hand in hand with her husband as she carried his golf kit.Both looked happy as the two laughed and were seen speaking to each other. A few days ago, Paulina Gretzky was also seen at LIV Golf Miami to be with her husband. The two took a private jet from Miami and then landed in Augusta, Georgia where the Masters Tournament began from 10th April.The NHL legend, Wayne Gretzky, was last spotted when Alex Ovechkin tied with him at 894 goals. Wayne Gretzky was spotted cheering for Alex Ovechkin as the crowd gave him a standing ovation at the Chicago Blackhawks‚Äô recent match.Wayne Gretzky complimented Alex Ovechkin‚Äôs efforts and said, ‚ÄúI can tell you firsthand I know how hard it is to get to 894, 895 is pretty special. They say records are meant to be broken, but I‚Äôm not sure who‚Äôs gonna get more goals than that.‚ÄùWayne Gretzky also made an appearance on TNT and said, ‚ÄúI was really happy for him, I felt like I scored the goal, does that make any sense? I know the pressure he was under, the microscope he was under, honestly I was relieved‚Äù.However, Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs children have stayed away from all the mess that the NHL legend had found himself in. Paulina Gretzky did not issue any statements when her father was getting trolled as fans believed that he supported Team USA at the 4 Nations Final match.The NHL legend has also not addressed the controversy in public and has kept himself away from all the mess as fans await for a statement from him.Also Read: Wayne Gretzky's daughter Paulina Gretzky flaunts her luxurious life as Wayne Gretzky receives a standing ovation
Article Summary: Paulina gretzky has been spending time with her husband, professional golfer, dustin johnson. The two were spotted in augusta, georgia for the masters tournament, which began on 10th april. A picture of the two went viral and it shows how supportive she has been of her husband's career.

Article Title: Detroit Red Wings: Detroit Red Wings and New Jersey Devils reveal re-shuffled lineups in late-season game
Article Text:
Detroit Red Wings vs New Jersey Devils (via Getty Images)


Detroit Red Wings balance lineup as New Jersey Devils seek to pick up the pace heading towards playoffs Suspension update Having secured their playoff or offseason course, the Detroit Red Wings and New Jersey Devils approach Wednesday night's game with new lineups and several important absentees. The Devils head to the playoffs and potentially the return of star defenseman Dougie Hamilton, while the Red Wings continue to limp through a season's worth of injuries as they finish up the regular season. The faceoff is at 7:30 p.m. ET and will appear on several networks such as truTV and TNT.The out-of-playoff-hope Detroit Red Wings are using the final quarter of the season to give younger players large amounts of ice time. Jonatan Berggren has risen to the first line with Dylan Larkin and Lucas Raymond, and Patrick Kane will ride the second line with emerging rookie Marco Kasper and sniper Alex DeBrincat.Veteran Vladimir Tarasenko is added to the third line along with J.T. Compher and Michael Rasmussen and adds experience and depth. Physicality and energy are added through the fourth line, comprised of Austin Watson, Tyler Motte, and Craig Smith. There is also youth and experience along Detroit's blue line in the pairing of Ben Chiarot and Moritz Seider as well as in the pairing of Simon Edvinsson and Jeff Petry.Goaltending will fall to Cam Talbot or Alex Lyon, with William Lagesson scratched and key names like Andrew Copp and Petr Mrazek due to injury.On the second bench, the New Jersey Devils seek to polish their game before the playoffs. Nico Hischier is the first-line centre with Stefan Noesen and Jesper Bratt, and Dawson Mercer and Timo Meier are with veteran Erik Haula on the second line. Tomas Tatar, Justin Dowling, and Cody Glass are depth lines, and the fourth line includes Nolan Foote, Marc McLaughlin, and Nathan Bastian.The best news for New Jersey is the possible return of defenseman Dougie Hamilton from an 18-game absence with a lower-body ailment. His presence alongside Brenden Dillon on the third blue line would be a welcome addition as the Devils play their first-round playoff contest against the Carolina Hurricanes.In net, Jacob Markstrom is the probable starter, with Jake Allen as his backup. Dennis Cholowski and a few others are healthy scratches, while Ondrej Palat is officially out after getting hit in the leg during Tuesday's overtime victory over the Boston Bruins.Forward Paul Cotter will miss the second of a two-game suspension for an illegal check to the head on New York Islanders defenseman Adam Pelech. The Devils will have to make up for his loss as they try to stay disciplined going into the playoffs.Also read: ‚ÄúPlaying our best‚Äù: Marco Kasper's heroics keep Red Wings in playoff hunt As the Red Wings are in development mode while the Devils attempt to hone their shape, the game at the Prudential Centre on Wednesday night presents opportunities for opposing aims. For the future of the Detroiters. For playoff preparations for the Devils.
Article Summary: Detroit red wings and new jersey devils face off at the prudential centre on wednesday night. The devils head to the playoffs and potentially the return of star defenseman dougie hamilton. The red wings continue to limp through a season's worth of injuries as they finish up the regular season.

Article Title: "F**k you Don Sweeney‚Äù: Brad Marchand‚Äôs 1100th NHL game sparks outrage among Boston Bruins fans
Article Text:
Image via Sam Navarro-Imagn Images

Brad Marchand plays his 1100th match, but fans are disappointed about it



Brad Marchand, the former captain of the Boston Bruins , spent 16 years with the team before he got traded to the Florida Panthers last month. A few days ago, Brad Marchand scored his first goal after joining the Florida Panthers, and he recently unlocked a new achievement. At the recent match against the Tampa Bay Lightning on April 16, 2025, Brad Marchand played his 1100th game in the NHL , but fans are not happy about it.Recently, the NHL took to its official social media accounts to congratulate Brad Marchand for playing his 1100th game. The post read as, ‚ÄúCareer NHL game No. 1‚É£, 1‚É£0‚É£0‚É£ for Brad Marchand! Congratulations to the @FlaPanthers forward ü´°‚Äù but it has disappointed some fans of the Boston Bruins.A fan commented, ‚ÄúIt hurts but congrats‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚Äúi dont even know this guy anymore.‚ÄùA third fan commented, ‚ÄúShould‚Äôve been all bruins photos‚Äù, while another user commented, ‚ÄúShould‚Äôve celebrated as a Bruin I AM SICK !!!! F**K YOU DON‚ÄùA fifth user noted, ‚ÄúHope you literally have nightmares every night about this Don Sweeney‚Äù, while another fan posted, ‚ÄúHe is missed in Boston that's for sure. But at least his season will continue lol unlike the @NHLBruins so guess he's gotta be happy.‚ÄùA seventh fan wrote, ‚ÄúCongrats, Brad. Even if youre now in red, youll always be Black and Gold to me.‚ÄùThe Boston Bruins‚Äô fans have been heartbroken ever since their former captain left the team last month. Many have slammed Don Sweeney for making such a decision.Last month, while speaking to the media, Brad Marchand did hint about returning to the Boston Bruins. He said, ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know what the future brings. Can things change down the road? Potentially, but that‚Äôs to be seen. I would still love‚Äîlike, (the trade) doesn‚Äôt change my love for the city, and the will to want to be here has never changed.‚ÄùHowever, nothing has been confirmed now, and at the moment, Brad Marchand is prepping for the NHL playoffs.Also Read: Brad Marchand and Evan Rodrigues exchange playful jabs in interview and fans are losing their minds over it
Article Summary: Brad marchand, the former captain of the boston bruins, spent 16 years with the team before he got traded to the florida panthers last month. At the recent match against the tampa bay lightning on april 16, 2025, brad marchand played his 1100th game in the nhl. However, fans are not happy about it.

Article Title: Will Gavin Lux play against Seattle Mariners tonight? Latest update on Cincinnati Reds star's injury report (April 16, 2025)
Article Text:
Will Gavin Lux play against Seattle Mariners tonight? Latest update on Cincinnati Reds star's injury report (April 16, 2025) (Image Source: Getty Images)

Cincinnati Reds getting healthier as roster reinforcements arrive

Where to watch the Cincinnati Reds vs the Seattle Mariners tonight

Gavin Lux is expected to be in the Cincinnati Reds lineup tonight against the Seattle Mariners following his impressive four-hit performance in Tuesday's victory. The second baseman showed no signs of injury concerns while going 4-for-4 with two RBIs in the Reds' 8-4 win over the Seattle Mariners on April 15. Cincinnati Reds fans will be eager to see if Gavin Lux can maintain this hot streak as the team looks to build on their recent success, having won four straight games and six of their last seven to move above .500 for the first time this season.Gavin Lux's contribution to Cincinnati's win Tuesday came off the back of the returns of Matt McLain and closer Alexis Diaz, both of whom have been bolstered by the Cincinnati Reds with the returns of a number of key players from injury. After spending 10 days on the injured list, Matt McLain walked three times and scored twice in his return game. Alexis Diaz, a 2023 All-Star, made his season debut after recovering from a hamstring injury, but he walked two in the sixth inning before recording two outs.The Cincinnati Reds got an immediate impact from Austin Hays, who socked a go-ahead three-run homer and delivered four runs overall in his Cincinnati Reds debut. Austin Hays was sidelined with a calf injury that she sustained just three days before the season opener and missed the team's first 16 games, before Tuesday's triumphant return.The Seattle Mariners (8-9) battle the Cincinnati Reds (9-8) tonight at 6:40 p.m. EDT at Great American Ball Park in the second of their current series. Nick Martinez (0-2, 6.06 ERA) will face Seattle Mariners starter Bryce Miller (0-2, 4.50 ERA) in another interleague battle between these two teams.Fans can catch the Cincinnati Reds taking on the Seattle Mariners tonight at Great American Ball Park with the first pitch scheduled for April 16th, 6:40 p.m. ET. The game will be broadcast on local television networks and through MLB.TV for out-of-market viewers. With Gavin Lux coming off a perfect night at the plate and the Cincinnati Reds winning six of their last seven games, Cincinnati Reds supporters have plenty of reasons for optimism heading into tonight's contest.The Cincinnati Reds will continue their homestand and hope that Gavin Lux can keep up his hot hitting and help the team secure a win over the road struggling Seattle Mariners, who have yet to win away from home this season with a 0-4 record.Also Read: ‚ÄúHe meant excellence‚Äù- Ex-basketball player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar pays tribute to MLB‚Äôs first Black player
Article Summary: Gavin lux is expected to be in the cincinnati reds lineup tonight against the seattle mariners. The second baseman showed no signs of injury concerns while going 4-for-4 with two rbis in the reds' 8-4 win over the mariners on april 15. The cincinnati reds have won four straight games and six of their last seven to move above.500 for the first time this season.

Article Title: Patriots make bold QB move: Why Joe Milton III‚Äôs trade could be a gamble
Article Text:
Joe Milton III (via: Getty Images)

Patriots‚Äô bold QB shift: What Milton‚Äôs trade means



HIGHLIGHTS: Joe Milton III's Best Plays vs. Buffalo Bills | NFL Week 18

The New England Patriots are making significant waves this offseason, but not all of their moves are as straightforward as they might seem. After a deeply disappointing 4-13 season, head coach Mike Vrabel is taking decisive action to overhaul the team‚Äôs roster, with a sharp and strategic focus on revitalizing the quarterback position. While much of the media attention is centered around rookie quarterback Drake Maye , who promises to be the team‚Äôs future under center, a surprising decision has raised more than a few eyebrows: the trade of the promising young QB Joe Milton III to the Dallas Cowboys.Joe Milton III showcased impressive talent during his brief appearances last season, including a notable debut in Week 18. With a cannon of an arm and raw potential, many believed he could be the future of the Patriots' quarterback room. However, the team‚Äôs decision to trade him for a fifth-round pick rather than developing him further, has many wondering if New England is betting too early on their new direction.The Patriots are putting their chips on Drake Maye, the No. 3 overall pick in 2024, and veteran Joshua Dobbs as the backup. With a revamped offensive line and new playmakers like Stefon Diggs , New England is prioritizing stability and experience under center. But is moving on from Milton too soon?Given Milton‚Äôs impressive athleticism and untapped upside, trading him now could very well be a missed opportunity for the Patriots. Teams with uncertain quarterback futures, especially those looking to rebuild, could have offered a more valuable return for Milton earlier in the offseason. By moving him so quickly, New England may have rushed the decision, potentially leaving room for regret if Milton goes on to find success as a starter elsewhere.Also Read: ‚ÄúI'm not Taylor Swift‚Äù - Serena Williams breaks silence on Super Bowl cameo with Kendrick Lamar The timing of the trade only adds to the uncertainty surrounding the move, raising more questions than answers. If Milton develops into a solid starter or even an elite quarterback down the line, the Patriots‚Äô decision to trade him so soon could become a major regret. New England‚Äôs gamble on Drake Maye could certainly pay off, but only time will tell if they made the right call in letting go of a player with so much potential. For now, the Patriots are focused on the present, but the future of their quarterback situation remains anything but certain.
Article Summary: Joe milton iii was traded to the dallas cowboys for a fifth-round pick. The patriots are putting their chips on drake maye, the no. 3 overall pick in 2024. With a revamped offensive line and new playmakers like stefon diggs, new england is prioritizing stability and experience under center.

Article Title: ‚ÄúThey‚Äôve won everything there is to win‚Äù: Drew McIntyre gets real about WWE legends John Cena and The Rock
Article Text:
(Image Via WWE)

Drew McIntyre breaks down John Cena and The Rock‚Äôs WWE personas

"Those guys [Rock and Cena] don't have to do it. Aside from the fact they made their name in wrestling and WWE at the top, top level, they're Hall of Famers, they've won everything there is to win, and giant household names. Then they transitioned over to Hollywood to show that wrestlers can do it all. Like, Rock's the biggest box office attraction in the world. Cena's absolutely killing it right now. There's no reason they have to come back and do what they're doing. They come back because they love it, because they're addicted to the crowd reaction, 'cause it's in their blood," said the WWE star.

"It's so cool to see that even as successful as they are, legitimately, especially Rock's case, the biggest stars in the world, they still want to come back and feed that addiction, which is the adrenaline addiction, the crowd reaction that you get."

Also Read

With WrestleMania 41 within a few days, Drew McIntyre ‚Äôs recent expressions about WWE legends have caught viewers‚Äô attention. The Scottish Warrior expressed his genuine opinion about the big shots of the industry, like The Rock and John Cena , and a possible reason behind their everlasting wrestling drive that makes them keep coming back for more despite the Hollywood royalty aspect in the picture.Not only did McIntyre display his admiration, but also his utmost respect for the WWE icons for stepping back inside the ring regardless of their alternative successful ventures to form a legacy like no other.The recent guest appearance of The Scotsman on the Untapped podcast has got the people talking. McIntyre‚Äôs perspectives about the consistency of Cena and The Rock have indeed enticed the fans when he was asked about how he looks forward to his wrestling career when he enters his 40s and 50s.Additionally, McIntyre stated his opinion on why Cena and The Rock return to the ring despite having extremely successful Hollywood careers. He stated,He continued further,Well, there is no denying the fact that Cena and The Rock truly have wrestling legacies forged; however, we would also agree with the fact that the WWE stage where they began their journey is homely and magnetic to them, even with success beaming for them outside the ring. With WrestleMania 41 on the horizon, fans eagerly await seeing their favorites rocking the stage with wrestling magic.
Article Summary: Drew mcintyre said john cena and the rock don't have to do what they're doing. Mcintyre also said that the wwe stage where they began their journey is homely and magnetic to them. With wrestlemania 41 on the horizon, fans eagerly await seeing their favorites rocking the stage with wrestling magic.

Article Title: Rohit Sharma opens up on dropping himself for Sydney Test: 'There was an argument ‚Ä¶'
Article Text:
File Pic: Rohit Sharma with head coach Gautam gambhir.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think Rohit Sharma made the right decision by opting out of the Sydney Test? Unsure, it's a complex situation No, he should have played regardless Yes, it was the best choice for the team

Bombay Sport Exchange EP 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

NEW DELHI: India captain Rohit Sharma has revealed that his decision to opt out of the Sydney Test during the recent Border-Gavaskar Trophy was not a straightforward one and involved a "disagreement" with team management.Speaking to former Australia captain Michael Clarke on the Beyond23 Cricket Podcast, Rohit explained that the move to drop himself came after introspection and honest assessment of his form, keeping the team‚Äôs best interest in mind.Also See: RR vs DC Rohit, who managed only 31 runs in five innings as India relinquished the Border-Gavaskar Trophy for the first time in a decade, admitted he wasn‚Äôt hitting the ball well and didn‚Äôt want to occupy a spot at the expense of someone better prepared."In the last Test match in Sydney, I had to be honest with myself. I was not hitting the ball well. And I didn't want to put myself there only because we had a lot of the other guys who were struggling as well," Rohit said.The final call, however, wasn‚Äôt without resistance. "I spoke to the coach and the selector, who was there on the tour. They kind of agreed ‚Äî not agreed. There was an argument around it," he revealed, referring to head coach Gautam Gambhir and chairman of selectors Ajit Agarkar . "You try and put the team first, and just look at what the team wants. Sometimes it may work, sometimes it may not."Highlighting the decision to bring back Shubman Gill for the series decider, Rohit added, "We wanted Gill to play. He's such a good player. He missed out in the previous Test match‚Ä¶ I was like, okay, if I'm not hitting the ball well, it's right now."Since assuming the captaincy, Rohit said his leadership philosophy has centered around team-first thinking. "Not just me, I wanted the rest of the guys also to think alike ‚Äî try and put the team first and not worry too much about 'my runs, my scores,‚Äô" he added.
Article Summary: Rohit sharma reveals his decision to opt out of the sydney test was not a straightforward one and involved a "disagreement" with team management. Sharma managed only 31 runs in five innings as india relinquished the border-gavaskar trophy for the first time in a decade.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Sunil Narine's bat fails gauge test amid crackdown on oversized willows - Watch
Article Text:
Sunil Narine fails bat test in Mullanpur. (Video grabs)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

WATCH:

Poll Do you support the BCCI's clampdown on oversized bats during IPL matches? No, it disrupts the game Yes, it's necessary for fair play

'I take the blame': Ajinkya Rahane after KKR's defeat to Punjab Kings

NEW DELHI: In a dramatic moment during Kolkata Knight Riders ' (KKR) Indian Premier League 2025 clash against Punjab Kings (PBKS) in Mullanpur, Sunil Narine's bat failed the official gauge test ‚Äî highlighting the BCCI's recent clampdown on oversized bats during live IPL matches.The incident occurred just before KKR began their unsuccessful chase of PBKS' modest 112-run target.Also See: DC vs RR Reserve umpire Saiyed Khalid conducted random checks outside the playing area, where Narine and fellow KKR batter Angkrish Raghuvanshi stood together. While Raghuvanshi's bat passed the standard test, the thickest part of Narine's bat couldn't slide through the house-shaped gauge, violating ICC's prescribed bat size limits.Despite the bat drama, Narine had a mixed outing ‚Äî claiming 2 for 14 with the ball but managing just 5 runs with the bat. Raghuvanshi top-scored for KKR with 37 off 28, yet the team crumbled from 62 for 2 to 95 all out.A second bat-related interruption came in the 16th over when Anrich Nortje was stopped by on-field umpires Mohit Krishnadas and Saidharshan Kumar. Nortje's bat also failed the gauge test, prompting substitute Rahmanullah Gurbaz to rush in with a replacement. However, the match ended before he could face a ball, as Andre Russell was dismissed immediately.These live checks mark a shift in BCCI protocol, with bat dimensions now scrutinised mid-match to prevent players from gaining illegal advantages through oversized blades. While previously done in dressing rooms, this season has seen on-field checks involving several players, including Shimron Hetmyer, Phil Salt, and Hardik Pandya.The ICC allows a maximum bat face width of 10.79 cm, blade thickness of 6.7 cm, edge width of 4 cm, and overall length of 96.4 cm.
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders batsman sunil narine's bat fails gauge test. Incident highlights bcci's clampdown on oversized bats during ipl matches. Narine had a mixed outing, claiming 2 for 14 with the ball but managing just 5 runs with the bat.

Article Title: Sanju Samson warned, Sandeep Sharma bowls 11-ball over: Rare on-field incidents during Delhi Capitals innings vs Rajasthan Royals
Article Text:
Rajasthan Royals skipper Sanju Samson with a teammate. (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think the umpire's intervention was necessary during the match? No, it disrupted the game. Yes, it was justified.

Most balls in an over in IPL

Does MS Dhoni have any luck left? Greenstone Lobo on CSK's 2025 chances!

NEW DELHI: The Indian Premier League 2025 clash between Delhi Capitals and Rajasthan Royals at the Arun Jaitley Stadium on Wednesday witnessed two rare on-field incidents in the final overs of the first innings.Batting first after losing the toss, Delhi Capitals posted a competitive 188 for 5, with opener Abishek Porel top-scoring with 49 off 37 balls. KL Rahul contributed 38 off 32, while skipper Axar Patel (34 off 14) and Tristan Stubbs (34* off 18) provided the late flourish. Jofra Archer led Rajasthan‚Äôs bowling with figures of 2 for 32 in four overs.But it was the chaotic finish to DC's innings that caught attention.In an unusual moment during the 19th over, the on-field umpire stopped play and had a word with RR captain and wicketkeeper Sanju Samson for standing too deep while keeping to Jofra Archer. Samson was almost on the edge of the inner circle, prompting the umpire to intervene just before Archer bowled his final delivery of the over.Then came a dramatic final over from Sandeep Sharma . The experienced pacer, who had given away just 14 runs in his first three overs, bowled an 11-ball over riddled with extras ‚Äî four wides and a no-ball ‚Äî and conceded 19 runs. With that, Sharma joined the unwanted record for most deliveries in an IPL over.The momentum clearly shifted in Delhi's favour after the prolonged final over.11 balls - Mohd Siraj vs MI Bengaluru 2023 (Over #19)11 balls - Tushar Deshpande vs LSG Chennai 2023 (Over #4)11 balls - Shardul Thakur vs KKR Kolkata 2025 (Over #13)11 balls - Sandeep Sharma vs DC Delhi 2025 (Over #20)
Article Summary: Delhi capitals posted 188-5 in their first innings against rajasthan royals. Abishek porel top-scored with 49 off 37 balls. Sandeep sharma bowled an 11-ball over riddled with extras and conceded 19 runs.

Article Title: Dallas Mavericks vs Sacramento Kings final injury report (April 16, 2025): Is Anthony Davis playing in tonight's NBA Play-In Tournament?
Article Text:
Anthony Davis (Image via Getty)

Dallas Mavericks Anthony Davis Key players available and missing for Mavericks vs Kings (April 16, 2025) Dallas Mavericks vs Sacramento Kings injury report for tonight‚Äôs game (April 16, 2025) Mavericks injury report April 16 (Image via NBA) Team Player Injury Status Dallas Mavericks Kyrie Irving Left ACL tear Out Dallas Mavericks Olivier-Maxence Prosper Right wrist surgery Out Dallas Mavericks Brandon Williams Oblique strain Questionable Dallas Mavericks Anthony Davis Left adductor strain Probable Sacramento Kings Jake LaRavia Left thumb fracture Out Sacramento Kings Malik Monk Left calf strain Out Dallas Mavericks face uphill battle against Sacramento Kings What to expect in the play-in matchup (April 16, 2025) Theand Sacramento Kings have released their injury reports ahead of Wednesday‚Äôs high-stakes NBA Play-In Tournament game. With the Mavericks fighting to extend their season, all eyes are on, who is listed as probable despite a left adductor strain. The Mavericks enter this must-win game with a mostly healthy roster, though a few key names are sidelined. Kyrie Irving remains out with a left ACL tear suffered against the Kings in March, while Olivier-Maxence Prosper is recovering from right wrist surgery. Brandon Williams, recently signed to a standard contract, is questionable with an oblique strain.Sacramento will be without Jake LaRavia (left thumb fracture) and Malik Monk (left calf strain). Monk‚Äôs absence is a significant blow, though he could return if the Kings advance.Dallas has struggled against Sacramento this season, losing all three matchups. Injuries played a role in those losses, with both Kyrie Irving and Anthony Davis getting hurt in the last two meetings.Despite the setbacks, the Mavericks have reinforcements. Dereck Lively II, Daniel Gafford, Dante Exum, Jaden Hardy, and P.J. Washington are all available after dealing with injuries late in the season. However, two-way players like Kai Jones and Kessler Edwards are ineligible for the postseason.The game tips off at 9 p.m. CST from the Golden 1 Center, with ESPN broadcasting the action. The Mavericks will need Anthony Davis at full strength to counter Sacramento‚Äôs physical play. His presence in the paint could be the difference-maker in a game where Dallas must break its losing streak against the Kings.Sacramento, meanwhile, will rely on its depth to compensate for Monk‚Äôs absence. The Kings‚Äô ability to exploit Dallas‚Äô defensive weaknesses could determine whether they advance or face elimination.Also read: Chicago Bulls vs Miami Heat final injury report (April 16, 2025): Key updates about Josh Giddey and Lonzo Ball ahead of elimination game With both teams fighting for playoff survival, this play-in clash promises high intensity and drama. Fans will find out soon if Anthony Davis can power the Mavericks to an upset or if the Kings will continue their dominance.
Article Summary: The dallas mavericks face the sacramento kings in a high-stakes nba play-in tournament game on wednesday. Both teams are fighting for playoff survival, and this play-in clash promises high intensity and drama. The game tips off at 9 p.m. cst from the golden 1 center, with espn broadcasting the action.

American hip-hop rapper Travis Scott is going to appear at the biggest upcoming event. With just days left for WrestleMania 41 to hit us with the wrestling wave, the company‚Äôs CCO, Triple H , just dropped the biggest confirmation about Scott‚Äôs attendance at the Show of the Shows.Even though we have not forgotten about the dramatic involvement of Scott to tame Cody Rhodes with Cena and The Rock just a few months ago, amid the dramatic climax of the Chamber match, this announcement has just amplified the excitement further.The American Rapper is a widely recognized and celebrated figure in WWE, from having one of his best-performing songs as the intro music that made us all go YEET to sharing the stage with Cena and The Rock for a moment that will go down in history.American journalist Dave Meltzer did hint towards a possibility of Scott being a part of the WrestleMania 41 plans; however, the official confirmation regarding the rapper‚Äôs presence at the grand event has arrived.While conversing on The Ankler podcast, Triple H and current WWE president Nick Khan emphasized Scott‚Äôs presence being a cherry on top during the iconic moment between The Rock and John Cena. Shedding some light upon the upcoming event, Triple H playfully confirmed the rapper‚Äôs appearance at the grand event by stating,He further added, ‚ÄúAs fans eagerly wait for WrestleMania 41, Scott‚Äôs appearance will indeed add more fuel to the fire, whether he stays inside or outside the ring, since the last time people saw him and The Rock was at the Chamber match.From hyping up the crowd to walking alongside a WWE megastar to the ring, buckle up as WWE is going Sicko Mode.

Article Title: Florida A&M hires Heisman winner and NBA veteran Charlie Ward as new men‚Äôs basketball coach
Article Text:
Charlie Ward (Image via Democrat)

Florida A&M

Charlie Ward

Charlie Ward‚Äôs legendary college career and transition to the NBA

Charlie Ward steps in after Patrick Crarey II‚Äôs departure

is reportedly closing in on a deal to hire former Heisman Trophy winner and NBA veteranas its next men‚Äôs basketball coach . According to ESPN, the university is finalizing the agreement, marking Ward‚Äôs first head coaching role at the collegiate level.Ward, who recently served as an assistant coach for USA Basketball at the 2025 Nike Hoops Summit, brings a wealth of experience as a former two-sport star at Florida State and a nine-year NBA player.The 54-year-old made history at Florida State, where he excelled in both football and basketball. In 1993, he led the Seminoles to a national championship in football while winning the Heisman Trophy. That season, he threw for 3,032 yards and 27 touchdowns with just four interceptions, completing nearly 70% of his passes. He also added 339 rushing yards and four scores.Despite his football success, Ward chose basketball as his professional path. The New York Knicks selected him in the first round of the 1994 NBA Draft. Over nine seasons with the franchise, he averaged 6.5 points per game and shot 41% from the field. He later played for the San Antonio Spurs and Houston Rockets before retiring.Charlie Ward will replace Patrick Crarey II, who left Florida A&M after just one season to coach Grambling. Under Crarey, the Rattlers finished 14-17 overall and 10-8 in the SWAC, an eight-game improvement from their 6-23 record the previous season.Florida A&M hasn‚Äôt had a winning season since 2007, when the team made the NCAA tournament as a No. 16 seed. Ward‚Äôs hiring signals a new era for the program as it looks to build on last season‚Äôs progress.With his deep ties to Florida sports and a decorated playing career, Ward‚Äôs arrival brings excitement and high expectations to Tallahassee. Fans will be eager to see if his leadership can guide the Rattlers back to postseason contention.Also read: Kentavious Caldwell-Pope's wife, McKenzie, stuns in chic Disney World look as husband gears up for NBA playoffs with the Denver Nuggets Charlie Ward‚Äôs hiring brings a mix of star power and untapped potential to Florida A&M basketball. Can his leadership turn the Rattlers into SWAC contenders, or will the transition from player to head coach prove challenging? We want to hear from you‚Äîdrop your thoughts in the comments: Is this the right move for FAMU?
Article Summary: Charlie ward will replace patrick crarey ii, who left florida a&m after just one season to coach grambling. The 54-year-old led the seminoles to a national championship in football while winning the heisman trophy in 1993. The new york knicks selected him in the first round of the 1994 nba draft.

Article Title: Serena Williams breaks silence on Super Bowl cameo with Kendrick Lamar
Article Text:
Serena Williams (Via: Getty Images)

Serena Williams explains real reason she showed up



Serena Williams Addresses If She Shaded Ex Drake With Super Bowl Performance | E! News

"Absolutely not

‚ÄúI‚Äôve never had any negative feelings toward him. We‚Äôve known each other for years."

The story behind Serena and Kendrick‚Äôs connection



‚ÄúI‚Äôm not Taylor Swift, let‚Äôs be honest,‚Äù

‚ÄúSome of y‚Äôall don‚Äôt understand how much

Serena

has been criticized for expressing herself in this way,‚Äù

When tennis legend Serena Williams appeared at the 2025 Super Bowl halftime show, it wasn‚Äôt just her presence that made waves, it was the speculation surrounding her cameo during Kendrick Lamar ‚Äôs controversial performance of "Not Like Us." With the lyrics aimed at her ex, rapper Drake, many wondered if Williams‚Äô appearance was a subtle message. But now, Williams is clearing the air.Serena Williams wasted no time addressing rumors about her involvement in Kendrick Lamar's Super Bowl halftime show. In an interview with Time‚Äôs 100 Most Influential People, she firmly rejected the notion that her brief moment on stage was a jab at Drake.," she said.Despite the intense speculation, Williams insists her appearance was not about revisiting the past, but about celebrating something far bigger, her long-standing connection with Kendrick Lamar.Williams‚Äô cameo was more than just a surprise. It was the result of a deep respect between her and Lamar. After winning a gold medal at the 2012 London Olympics, Williams made headlines for performing the Crip Walk, a move that sparked some media backlash. But Kendrick Lamar saw it differently, he admired how she represented hip-hop on the world stage.Serena said she was shocked when Kendrick asked her to join him for the Super Bowl. She admitted she‚Äôs not known for dancing, saying,but added that the moment felt special because of their bond.Also Read: Dak Prescott leads charge, but Cowboys must secure Micah Parsons long-term Her husband, Alexis Ohanian, also weighed in, defending the moment as a cultural celebration, not a personal dig.he posted on X, highlighting the significance beyond the music.In the end, Serena Williams‚Äô Super Bowl cameo wasn‚Äôt about drama or dissing anyone. It was a celebration of culture, friendship, and mutual respect between two icons. While the rumors may continue to swirl, the truth is clear: this moment was about much more than the past, it was about acknowledging the impact of both Williams and Kendrick Lamar on the global stage.
Article Summary: Serena williams addressed rumors about her involvement in kendrick lamar's super bowl halftime show. In an interview with time‚Äôs 100 most influential people, she firmly rejected the notion that her brief moment on stage was a jab at drake. Williams said she was shocked when kendrick asked her to join him for the super bowl.

Article Title: K Humpy secures victory against Divya Deshmukh in FIDE Women's Grand Prix
Article Text:
K Humpy

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bombay Sport Exchange EP 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

PUNE: K Humpy , already in with a chance to convert a good position into a winning advantage, almost touched her bishop before playing the 31st move. And her rival Divya Deshmukh lifted her pen to write the move.Humpy changed her course and came up with a better move ‚Äî Qc8. Humpy‚Äôs performance was not machine like. But she brought all her experience into play and outplayed the overnight leader with white pieces to win in 53 moves in almost five hours of play in the third round of the FIDE Women‚Äôs Grand Prix on Wednesday.Not for nothing is she the reigning world rapid champion and has maintained her status as India‚Äôs premier woman player. Divya‚Äôs defeat and other overnight leader Zhu Jiner‚Äôs draw with Salome Melia of Georgia meant the Chinese took the sole lead with 2.5 points. It was a good day for India as D Harika beat Bulgarian Nurgyul Salimova for her first win.R Vaishali drew with Russian Polina Shuvalova in the rook and pawns endgame and recovered from her defeat to Divya the previous day. Batkhuyag Munguntuul of Mongolia (Elo 2361) beat Alina Kashlinskaya of Poland (2196) with black pieces. Munguntuul, like Divya, has played all three decisive games so far.Humpy and Shuvalova are with them in joint second spot with two points each. Humpy got the good vibes after Divya played ‚Äòh6‚Äô on the 11th turn i n t h e Fo u r Knights Symmetrical English, an opening in which both are not regulars.Though the engine did not object to Divya‚Äôs pawn push, Humpy felt it was ‚Äúbad‚Äù. The 38-year-old even searched for a mating attack by first putting her knights in the centre and then getting a double bishop advantage (against knight and bishop; in rook and pawns each endgame).But she had to recalibrate her thoughts after Divya fought well. Humpy had to accept that the likelihood of mating attack had evaporated. She had to be flexible, ruthless and practical in this phase when queens were exchanged. And she squeezed out the winning advantage in a professional manner.Divya resigned when she was about to lose material. Earlier, Divya felt she had not made the time control after the first 40 moves. Her move sheet was showing only 38 moves since she had written them close to each other and not in the designed rectangles.Here again Humpy‚Äôs wisdom showed as she made some waiting moves to ensure that she would make the time control even if the fault could be spotted in her notation of moves later
Article Summary: K humpy beat her rival divya deshmukh in the third round of the fide women‚Äôs grand prix on wednesday. Humpy is the reigning world rapid champion and has maintained her status as india's premier woman player. It was a good day for india as d harika beat bulgarian nurgyul salimova for her first win.
